Chloe Ferry shared a sizzling new sultry snap to her Instagram page on Thursday evening.

The Geordie Shore star stripped down to her underwear to share the effects of using Bronzed Glamour fake-tan.

The incredibly tanned reality star left little to the imagination as she wiggled her surgically enhanced curves into a lacy red thong and cropped bra top which struggled to contain her ample assets.

Chloe, 23, drew attention to her impossibly tiny waist and sucked in her toned stomach as she posed up a storm for her 3.4 million Instagram followers.

The reality TV star perfected the ultimate Instagram-worthy pose as she dramatically pouted her hugely plumped lips and pushed her hand through her luscious blonde locks.

Chloe opted for a glamorous make-up look with fake eyelashes, thick foundation and a lashings of nude lipgloss.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The MTV babe's latest racy snap comes as the star continues to show her ex-boyfriend and former co-star Sam Gowland exactly what he's missing.

Things turned toxic when the pair finally called it a day on their relationship last month.

Sam accused Chloe of ' lying, cheating and selling fake stories ' while she accused him of having sex with his Love Island co-star Amber Davies .

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Sam, who met Chloe after leaving the Love Island villa in 2017, claimed Chloe made up the Amber accusations after she said she discovered incriminating messages on his laptop.

Its been a whirlwind few weeks for Chloe as she has wildly partied with Katie Price and got rid of her ex Sam and former Geordie Shore co-star for good.

Although the pair have officially broken up, fans were left confused in recent weeks as the pair enjoyed a secret holiday in Dubai together.
